description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Login', which renders a login form interface. It manages state for email, password, submission status, and errors. It uses React hooks and react-router-dom hooks to handle navigation, routing, and context for authentication actions. The component handles login form submission by calling an external login function and redirects users upon successful login or shows errors if authentication fails.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles form submission; calls login action and redirects on success, or sets error on failure.
